rev.desc.rev.desc: Modification done for CenterPoint Task 22900 for Request 24287. Code put in to skip the compilation process if the screen ID of a displayscreen record is null. (This is made necessary because there could be (for whatever reason) garbage display screens out there.)
See the document named Tsk22900Rqs24287A.doc attached to that task for details.

descript.descript: Modification done for CenterPoint Task 22900 for Request 24287. Code put in to skip the compilation process if the screen ID of a displayscreen record is null. (This is made necessary because there could be (for whatever reason) garbage display screens out there.)
See the document named Tsk22900Rqs24287A.doc attached to that task for details.
